DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Suit Filed Over Magma Power Takeover_Bid : California Energy Co. , pressing to acquire control of Magma Power Co. , sued the company ' s directors over steps they have taken_to block the takeover . The suit , filed_in U.S. District Court in Nevada , accuses the directors of breaching their fiduciary_duty to shareholders . Omaha-based California Energy , which has launched a $ 434-million , $ 35-a-share cash tender offering for San Diego-based Magma , specifically targeted in the lawsuit " golden_parachute " and " poison_pill " provisions it says the board adopted to thwart the takeover .
